title: Dow closes above 50,000, Nvidia soars as traders focus on AI spending
title_zh: 道指收于 50,000 点上方，交易员关注人工智能支出，英伟达股价飙升
summary: STORY: The Dow Jones Industrial Average blew past the historic 50,000 mark on Friday, climbing nearly 2.5%, while the S&P 500 gained about 2% and the Nasdaq added more than 2%.Chip stocks led the way, rallying on expectations they would benefit from increased spending on AI da...
summary_zh: 故事：道琼斯工业平均指数周五突破历史性的 50,000 点大关，上涨近 2.5%，而标准普尔 500 指数上涨约 2%，纳斯达克指数上涨超过 2%。芯片股领涨，因预期它们将受益于人工智能数据支出的增加而上涨。

title: Markets have witnessed 'coalescence of risk taking' last 2 years
title_zh: 过去两年市场见证了“风险承担的合并”
summary: As US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) recovered from this week's sell-off in the tech and software industries, the Dow Jones Industrial Average managed to close above 50,000 points on Friday.
summary_zh: 随着美国股市（^DJI、^IXIC、^GSPC）从本周科技和软件行业的抛售中恢复过来，道琼斯工业平均指数周五收于 50,000 点之上。

title: Jennifer Garner-backed kids' food brand Once Upon a Farm rises 16% in Wall Street debut
title_zh: Jennifer Garner 支持的儿童食品品牌 Once Upon a Farm 在华尔街上市首日股价上涨 16%
summary: The stock jumped in its public debut to $21 per share.
summary_zh: 该股首次公开亮相时飙升至每股 21 美元。

title: Earnings live: Amazon, Reddit stocks sink to cap jam-packed earnings week
title_zh: 财报实时公布：亚马逊、Reddit 股价下跌，为拥挤的财报周画上句号
summary: The S&P 500 was on track for double-digit earnings growth, with more than half of companies having reported Q4 results so far.
summary_zh: 标准普尔 500 指数有望实现两位数的盈利增长，迄今为止已有超过一半的公司公布了第四季度业绩。

title: Tesla executives say company is hiring to support Musk’s expanded solar strategy
title_zh: 特斯拉高管表示，公司正在招聘员工以支持马斯克扩大太阳能战略
summary: Tesla  is hiring to support founder Elon Musk's recently announced plan to become the biggest U.S. manufacturer of solar energy components, according to online posts by senior executives at the company.
summary_zh: 据该公司高管在网上发布的帖子称，特斯拉正在招聘员工，以支持创始人埃隆·马斯克最近宣布的成为美国最大太阳能组件制造商的计划。

title: Tech sell-off: Investors may have just missed chance to buy the dip
title_zh: 科技股遭抛售：投资者可能错过了逢低买入的机会
summary: As US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) look to recover from this week's broad sell-off in tech and software stocks, is it too late for investors to have bought the dip? Manulife John Hancock Investments co-chief investment strategist Emily Roland weighs in with her thoughts.
summary_zh: 随着美国股市（^DJI、^IXIC、^GSPC）有望从本周科技和软件股的广泛抛售中恢复过来，投资者逢低买入是否为时已晚？宏利约翰汉考克投资联席首席投资策略师艾米丽罗兰发表了自己的看法。

title: Stock market today: Dow closes above 50,000 for the first time as stocks soar to cap volatile week
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数首次收于 50,000 点之上，股市飙升，结束本周的波动
summary: Wall Street is weighing whether the AI fears behind the recent tech-driven sell-off were exaggerated.
summary_zh: 华尔街正在权衡近期科技驱动的抛售背后对人工智能的担忧是否被夸大。

title: Big Tech set to spend $650 billion in 2026 as AI investments soar
title_zh: 随着人工智能投资飙升，大型科技公司将在 2026 年花费 6500 亿美元
summary: Alphabet, Microsoft, Amazon, and Meta are on track to spend between $635 billion and $665 billion in their respective 2026 fiscal years.
summary_zh: Alphabet、微软、亚马逊和 Meta 预计在各自 2026 财年的支出将在 6,350 亿至 6,650 亿美元之间。

title: Amazon e-commerce needs to grow to keep up with AI's ROI: Analyst
title_zh: 亚马逊电子商务需要增长才能跟上人工智能的投资回报率：分析师
summary: Amazon stock (AMZN) is dropping in Friday's pre-market trading after the tech giant released forecasts of $200 billion in capex spending for 2026 alongside its fourth quarter earnings.
summary_zh: 亚马逊 (AMZN) 股价在周五盘前交易中下跌，此前这家科技巨头发布了 2026 年资本支出和第四季度收益预计将达到 2000 亿美元的预测。
